title: Why2why
author: Why2why
content: Good day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.Welcome to the forum.You may have read the forum rules, but you need to see the systems that the forum uses, whether in upgrading membership or trust. Just reading about these two topics will not help you much, but if you continue to be present on the forum, you will surely conclude how it works and the feasibility of it on your own.Those coins that you want to collect are merit points that the rest of the members will give you if they find that one of your publications deserves it. Try to focus on creating good posts and you will definitely get some. Merit & new rank requirementsQuote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMThe forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Don't bother with the topic.Today is the first of April, and we have become accustomed every year on this date to have fun with the administration of the forum with what is called the April Fool's Day.Don't freak out. Tomorrow you will not find any of those warnings that you see today.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.You might have a thought like what kind of forum is this labeling one a spammer on his first post. But no need to worry mate the puzzle was thymos(forum main administrator) April fool stunt. Just like what Kavelj22 said it will be gone soon although I don’t know maybe the administrator would consider keeping permanent as this is also my first April on the forum. Here is a guide by NotATether on how to solve the puzzle. It is a lot harder while using mobile phones but easier on using a PC.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Read the forum news update on the uppermost of the page close to your forum user name, you will get a detailed explanation of what is happening with solving the captcha and I advised you to use a PC to solve it as it has proven to be difficult on mobile devices. Old members are speculating that this is an Aprile fool prank from the Admin, but I don't know how real that is we may have to wait out the time to see what becomes the outcome of this development is.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on April 01, 2023, 09:55:34 AMRead the forum news update on the uppermost of the page close to your forum user name, you will get a detailed explanation of what is happening with solving the captcha and I advised you to use a PC to solve it as it has proven to be difficult on mobile devices. Old members are speculating that this is an Aprile fool prank from the Admin, but I don't know how real that is we may have to wait out the time to see what becomes the outcome of this development is. You guys are honestly worrying too much about it.Relax and have fun, today is April Fools' Day  We, the older members, who have been on this forum for years, already know that theymos is very creative and that on this day he always comes up with a good prank for all forum members.After all, isn't it suspicious that almost all forum members received this warning?And advice for new members, be constructive, don't spam and you'll be fine

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.Hello and welcome to the forum! We're glad to have you here.Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMThe forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Relax, my friend. A lot of us are being accused of spamming today. It's just a harmless prank for April Fool's Day!

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Observe how the bird reacts when you tap the screen. After that it'll just be a matter of timing. You are spammer, no doubt about it. All users who posted here are also spammers, including me.Happy April 1st!!! Welcome to the forum, this is just one gimmick of Bitcointalk management  I love it !Captcha solved!!!

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMThe forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Sure you are if you did believe it. But like others said we are caught with this April fools day set up by the admins. So calm down and relax. If I ever read theymos message like that not in April Fools day then I will be nervous since a lot of people here might be spammer regardless of rank due to this hard bypass captcha.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMThe forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to meYou only turned to be a suspected spammer after you make a post and skip the captcha puzzle.Quotebecause I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.It's good to read rules after registration but you did even better, read rules before register your account. Impressive enough.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Hello and welcome to the Bitcointalk forum, mate. I am glad you were able to go through the forum rules and regulations as you stated, and I am sure this will make the forum easier for you because you will be able to interact freely with other forum users without fear of violating any of the forum rules now that you have them.This CAPTCHA was introduced to the form earlier this morning by Thymos, and I believe it is for April Fool's Day fun. I'm not sure if it will remain as one of the forum rules to prevent spam posts, but the puzzle is difficult to get two points.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum. Welcome to this largest Crypto Forum. It's the most effective place to discuss about cryptocurrency and here you must follow rules to post your thoughts. Hope you have read forum rules and you can find them at the top of the every board. Playing puzzle is very easy you just need to Catch the Bitcoins by jumping and collect points to post. Try it it's very easy to play.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Haha, we're the same, due to my consciousness I read it first on the meta section and find an answer to my questions. You should do the same, and spend more time reading than posting, this is an ideal way for a newbie not to violate rules and regulations or go with the flow of April Fools Day. But appreciate that as a newbie you're concerned about the forum rules, just enjoy the game resolving the captcha and enjoy the last remaining time of April Fools Day.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum, mate. It's good that you were able to go through the forum rules as you stated, and I'm sure this will make the forum easier for you. Just relax and have fun. Today is April Fools' Day, after all.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.Your arrival was immediately given a surprise with a notification (This user is a suspected spammer!) On your first post. Don't worry too much, forums don't say you're the only spammer, we're all spammers. Quote from: theymos on April 01, 2023, 12:03:47 AMRight now the CAPTCHA is in beta testing, so it only shows a warning banner for likely spammers, but in 2 weeks everyone who fails the CAPTCHA will be immediately banned, so you'd better get used to it!You should make a habit of solving CAPTCHAs to get rid of spammer Notifications. I hope what theymos said doesn't actually happen. Solving CAPTCHA is not easy, the more active the topic you want to leave a comment on, the more difficult it is to solve CAPTCHA.

comments.author: Fullcoinese
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMThe forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Welcome to the forum,it must be unpleasant when you just enter the forum and get a surprise like that. you get a unique first impression from other members, especially those who have been on the forum for a long time. I hope you don't get hurt after creating this thread and then leaving the forum.go to the Meta board, you will see a lot of threads answering your question. and I hope you come back to the forum and restart the journey you just started.don't forget to come back to this thread and be happy.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Nice observation about the forum rules including the current extra security to control spammer. Just play the game below through collecting the required coins being ask on your screen. This game is visible when you are making post.You will be tagged as spammer if you post without completing the captcha task which is getting the coin on flappy bird game. This is just a temporary feature dedicated for April fools celebration but it’s not bad following it if you want to become non-spammer while the rest of us is spammer on this single day. Honestly, I’d rather tagged as spammer rather than completing this insanely hard flappy bird. It’s harder when you complete more.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: I can understand op's surprise after reading the rules and not getting the latest of the spammers rules   I usually look forward to April ist on this forum and theymos never stopped pulling this gimmicks. This year's April fool is more facilitate because of the attachment of spammer and a newbie is getting worried why he should be called a spammer. Just soon it will go off except theymos decides to make the birds keep flying.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: If I were you, I would definitely freak out too seeing that after reading the rules of the forum you saw that spaming is not allowed and on exactly your first post you were tag by the forum software as a suspected spammers although as I have read so many comments from seniors that says its just a April fools day joke by the forum admin but I was pretty shocked and surprise too like the way you are now but am waiting for the whole day to clear up to actually see to claims of this new update so I think there is no need to be scared so just go with the vibe of the April fools day till it actually clears out but for now most people in the forum are all suspected spammers

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Looking new format written I checked here and just updated depend I want, every time confused about writing format how to use bold, underline and center image put. But after looking the other user written I can modify about how have to do and seems easy than checking thread or board discussing about writing format.But I am attention with your because brave asking what not understand yet, don't be shy if have anything not understand in Bitcointalk forum all user welcome to help you and give source link ho to start or guider as beginner, but my tick is seems effective if you confused how to understand about writing format in Bitcointalk forum.

comments.author: Rigon
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on April 01, 2023, 08:56:58 AMGood day to everyone here in this forum, this is my first post and I want you guys to please help me with how to solve the puzzle and collect coins before I make a post in the forum.The forum said I am a suspected spammer but how can I be a spammer here when I am not even a member someone please help clarify this to me, because I cant see that in the bitcointalk rules I read.Thank you for landing on the forum. There's no reason to worry so much about the thing you're so worried about. Seeing the red writing above, you are very worried. Those who cannot complete the captcha have posts with red text above their posts. To remove this post you need to fill captcha by mobile then post. I have done it a few times but need to fill the captcha again and again to post again and again. I'm not worried about it because the admin made it an april fool.
